ValidationRule.description: STP-2299 - MC - Validate if criteria met for Commercial Analytics & Modelling DSR to be created.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(RecordType.DeveloperName ="Commercial_Analytics_Modelling", IF(Opportunity__r.Opportunity_Annualised_Value__c < 1000000, IF( Opportunity__r.Has_Solution_Consultant__c = FALSE, IF( Opportunity__r.Has_Product_Specialist__c = FALSE, true, false) , false) , false) , false)
